abstract: The survey of more than 82,000 owners of 2010 vehicles showed Toyota dropped to 21st place, from sixth in 2009.
snippet: The survey of more than 82,000 owners of 2010 vehicles showed Toyota dropped to 21st place, from sixth in 2009.
lead_paragraph: A new consumer survey shows that Toyota has paid dearly among car owners for its recalls over accelerator pedal problems.

headline.main: Toyota’s Image Falls in J.D. Power Survey
headline.print_headline: Toyota’s Image Falls in J.D. Power Survey

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: LEXUS DIVISION OF TOYOTA MOTOR SALES USA
